segments.text: I absolutely love what you're wearing today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You do ? I just bought this outfit a couple days ago .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Seriously , it looks really nice on you . Where did you buy it from ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I bought it from the Macy's at the Santa Anita mall .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks . I think you look nice today , too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . I just bought these new shoes earlier today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Those are nice . What are they ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Those are great . How much were they ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think I might go and find me my own pair of Chucks .
segments.speaker: S2
